abstracts.cdata!:
On January 10, 2006, the inspection
            panel, which had registered a request for inspection
            concerning the Honduras Land Administration Project, issued
            its report outlining the findings of the investigation which
            had been authorized by the Executive Directors on May 30,
            2006. Management appreciates the panel's clear and
            thorough presentation of its findings. This report,
            responding to the findings of the panel, is organized in
            several sections. Section two briefly describes the project
            and provides an update on project status. Section three
            summarizes the findings and observations of the panel, while
            section four provides additional background information on
            several key issues. Management presents its action plan in
            response to the panel's findings in section five, and
            the conclusion to the report in section six. A detailed
            matrix containing the panel's findings, along with
            management's responses, is provided in annex one.
